about.title: About AI-Based Pest Outbreak Prediction Systems
about.intro: This platform is an AI-powered agricultural advisory system designed to help farmers and agronomy teams detect pest risks early and respond with confidence.
about.overviewBody1: The system uses climate and crop context to forecast potential pest outbreaks and provide proactive field guidance. It is built as a modern forecasting platform focused on operational clarity and practical action.
about.overviewBody2: By combining data-driven insights with intuitive workflows, the platform helps reduce reaction time and supports sustainable agriculture through earlier risk detection.
about.missionBody: Empower farmers with timely, intelligent pest risk insights so they can protect yields, reduce losses, and make stronger day-to-day decisions.
about.visionBody: Build a scalable and trusted agri-intelligence platform that enables resilient farming ecosystems through predictive analytics and responsible technology adoption.
about.tech1: React frontend with a responsive SaaS-style user experience.
about.tech2: FastAPI backend services for secure, high-performance APIs.
about.tech3: PostgreSQL for structured and reliable data management.
about.tech4: ML-ready architecture for evolving risk models and model integration.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: These terms govern your use of the AI-Based Pest Outbreak Prediction System platform and associated advisory services.
terms.usageBody: You agree to use this platform lawfully and only for legitimate agricultural analysis and decision support. Unauthorized access, misuse, or disruption of system functions is prohibited.
terms.dataBody: Insights are generated from available crop, climate, and usage data. Data quality, timeliness, and regional coverage may impact forecast accuracy.
terms.guaranteeBody: Predictions provided by this platform are advisory in nature and do not constitute guaranteed outcomes. Users remain responsible for final farm management decisions.
terms.ipBody: Platform content, design, analytics workflows, and software components are protected intellectual property. Reproduction or redistribution without authorization is not permitted.
terms.liabilityBody: To the maximum extent permitted by law, the platform owners are not liable for direct or indirect losses arising from use of advisory predictions, including crop or business impacts.
terms.responsibility1: Provide accurate account information and protect account credentials.
terms.responsibility2: Validate recommendations using local agronomic conditions.
terms.responsibility3: Comply with applicable laws, regulations, and farm safety standards.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy explains how AI-Based Pest Outbreak Prediction System collects, uses, and safeguards user data.
privacy.collect1: Account details such as email address for authentication.
privacy.collect2: Basic usage data to improve reliability and user experience.
privacy.collect3: Technical metadata for performance monitoring and security controls.
privacy.useBody: We use collected data to enable secure login, operate platform features, improve model-driven workflows, and enhance overall system quality and service continuity.
privacy.protectionBody: We apply administrative and technical safeguards to protect personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or loss.
privacy.saleBody: We do not sell personal information to third parties. Data sharing is limited to essential service operations and legal compliance requirements.
privacy.cookiesBody: The platform may use browser storage or session-related mechanisms for authentication continuity and essential application behavior.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor current outbreak risk levels across key modules.
dashboard.heatmapSubtitle: Geo-risk monitoring across key agricultural regions.
dashboard.satelliteSubtitle: Climate-risk overlays with AI-driven zone emphasis.
dashboard.historicalSubtitle: Compare outbreak behavior by year and region.
dashboard.card1Desc: Current pressure forecast generated from local pattern signals.
dashboard.card2Desc: Rainfall and humidity trends indicate moderate outbreak conditions.
dashboard.card3Desc: Early preventive treatment window is currently favorable.
dashboard.recommendedActionValue: Start targeted field spray within 48 hours.
dashboard.preventiveItem1: Scout field edges every morning for fresh infestation signs.
dashboard.preventiveItem2: Avoid excess nitrogen in the next irrigation cycle.
dashboard.preventiveItem3: Use pheromone/light traps to reduce pest build-up.
dashboard.preventiveItem4: Coordinate village-level spray timing for better control.
dashboard.xaiFactor1Desc: High humidity increased pest growth probability.
dashboard.xaiFactor2Desc: Current temperature range supports pest breeding.
dashboard.xaiFactor3Desc: Recent rainfall triggered larval spread risk.

alert.low: Low-risk condition detected. Continue routine preventive monitoring.
alert.medium: Moderate risk detected. Prepare preventive action in this cycle.
alert.high: High-risk alert: Immediate intervention is strongly recommended.
